@@ -0,0 +1,15 @@

+  --> $DIR/drop-fail.rs:41:9
+   |
+LL |     let mut tmp = None;
+   |         ^^^^^^^ constants cannot evaluate destructors
+
+error: aborting due to 2 previous errors
+
